meanings.definition: Of very poor quality or extremely bad.
meanings.sent1: The crappiest toy broke after just one day.
meanings.sent2: This is the crappiest movie I've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: Even the crappiest jokes can make us laugh sometimes.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as crappiest as the rainy weather outside.
meanings.sent5: The crappiest food at the party was the cold pizza.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of 'crappy', meaning the worst or least desirable.
meanings.sent1: He always gets the crappiest of the prizes in the raffle.
meanings.sent2: The crappiest is yet to come in this competition.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to herself as the crappiest of the group.
meanings.sent4: The crappiest of times can teach us valuable lessons.
meanings.sent5: In the box of chocolates, I always pick the crappiest first.
